lines.text:
[on dimes]
And I though all you were good for was parking meters and payphones.

[pointing a gun at a hostage taker's groin]
If you wanna have kids put down the gun.
There's a radio in the chopper... but there's an idiot on the other end of it.

[to number three]
Sorry about the face, wasn't personal... but you were spraying bullets at me.
Walt, you're too stupid to live.
